items.title: Afterlifetime
items.description: A lowly UN intern finds herself expired on the banks of the River Styx and discovers that Death himself has enlisted her to stop a monumental war that threatens to tear the afterlife into a new one.

items.title: On the Ropes
items.description: “On the ropes” is a story that reflects the Lebanese society trough a family whose members’ life is suspended like everything else in the country.

items.title: Supercool
items.description: Chaos ensues when a high school poser lies his way into a date with the daughter of a sociopathic hoodlum.

items.title: Slacker Mom
items.description: Do mommy bloggers and Pinterest make you want to take a nap? SLACKER MOM is here to save your butt with hilarious and sometimes useful #momhacks for #slackermoms.

items.title: Monsoon Lover
items.description: Thomas McIntyre has come to Cambodia to escape his past. But when an old friend hires Thomas to take him on a tour through the underbelly of Cambodia's pervasive sex trade culture, Thomas must face his enemies to save himself and the woman he loves.

items.title: The Safety Plan
items.description: Amid an existential crisis, a socially-inept New Yorker impulsively relocates to Los Angeles in search of a chosen family in the LGBTQIA+ community only to discover making friends later in life is harder than imagined.

items.title: Selfie with Democracy
items.description: The Story is about two Male Angels sent to Earth by God’s orders. Meanwhile, one of the Angels falls in love with a Girl on earth who was part of their mission. The Angel asks The Lord to become a Human and stay on earth for her.

items.title: Filtered
items.description: A powerful, poignant, honest look at social media told by the teenagers who live it.

items.title: Human Predator
items.description: A man who lives his daily life in torment is incapable of leaving aside his most primitive and savage side, despite leading an apparently normal life. Everything gets complicated when a woman appears in his life and he becomes obsessed with her.

items.title: Slacker Mom
items.description: Do mommy bloggers and Pinterest make you want to take a nap? SLACKER MOM is here to save your butt with hilarious and sometimes useful #momhacks for #slackermoms.

items.title: Manicure
items.description: Mr. Chopp Chopp, a successful podcaster, bought a nail salon. His idea of a successful nail shop would be run by men, so he hires Klepto and Two-Braids as manicurists. The nail shop struggles to maintain and Mr. Chopp comes up with various hustles.

items.title: Body Swap
items.description: CJ is a high-strung businesswoman. Casey is a laid-back slacker. When a mishap forces them to swap bodies they must pretend to be each other. Romantic comedy meets body-swap comedy.

items.title: Pegasus
items.description: Five years ago, veteran driver Zhang Chi was suspended for illegal racing. When he returned to the game, he found himself starting all over again. After some difficulties, he and his car appeared again on the Bayinbrooke circuit.

items.title: Let Me Be Frank
items.description: A young rapper moves to Los Angeles in search of stardom and instead finds an unlikely friend in his dispirited apartment manager whose dreams led him to the same city twenty years prior.

items.title: Clay Zombies
items.description: After a scientist accidentally starts the Claypocalpyse, Ohio is overrun with Clay Zombies. With the help of a charming cast of characters, a local comic store clerk fights to reunite with his dog. Touch the clay, and you're gonna have a bad day!

items.title: The Safety Plan
items.description: Amid an existential crisis, a socially-inept New Yorker impulsively relocates to Los Angeles in search of a chosen family in the LGBTQIA+ community only to discover making friends later in life is harder than imagined.

items.title: Not by the Book
items.description: After being caught cheating on a test, a high school student is blackmailed into helping his teacher kidnap her philandering husband.

items.title: Slacker Mom
items.description: Do mommy bloggers and Pinterest make you want to take a nap? SLACKER MOM is here to save your butt with hilarious and sometimes useful #momhacks for #slackermoms.

items.title: The Sorrento Job
items.description: A group of NJ friends gangs up together to pull off the rarest wine heist in modern-day history. They plot to steal the wine from the mob and endanger themselves to the wrath of Donna Maria, the Boss. Who will come out on top with the wine?

items.title: In the Moment
items.description: A hilarious comedy about different cultures, the struggles of acting, and life in the big city. After being accepted into renowned actor Matt Turner's acting class, a sheltered, small-town girl, moves to the city to pursue her dream of acting.

items.title: Bernie Problems
items.description: Problems after problems, a man finds his purpose and the love of his life. Bernie Problems Is a movie about addiction, faith, hope, and love.

items.title: God's Not Here
items.description: The first-ever faith-based anthology film featuring four stories about forgiveness, love, hope and faith.

items.title: The Extraordinary Ordinary
items.description: Three young adults with a history of mental health issues learn how to cope with triggers when old wounds resurface.

items.title: American Barbarian
items.description: Satire, dark comedy, and a rock n’ roll soundtrack give American Barbarian a tragicomic vibe completely relevant for the absurd times we live in.

items.title: Forgiving God
items.description: Jon Moore, orphaned at nine and raised in an abusive foster system, learns about faith and forgiveness from a mysterious girl he meets while placed in a final foster home. He falls in love only to learn that she harbours a tragedy of her own.

items.title: Punk Love: Director's Cut
items.description: Director’s Cut of the multi-award-winning drama Punk Love. Hoping to find a better life, a drug-addicted musician (Chad Lindberg) and his young girlfriend (Emma Bing) embark on a crime spree.

items.title: On the Ropes
items.description: “On the ropes” is a story that reflects the Lebanese society trough a family whose members’ life is suspended like everything else in the country.

items.title: Filtered
items.description: A powerful, poignant, honest look at social media told by the teenagers who live it.

items.title: Cuento de Primavera-A Spring Tale
items.description: Farah, Belisa, and Alma find themselves trapped in a life they wish to change. They don’t suspect the bond they will share with the mysterious Ícaro, in what will become the most important spring of their existence.

items.title: Mind Altering Stories
items.description: This anthology film will make you unaware of nonverbal communication with rideshare drivers, your neighbors and children. These characters are pushed too far in unthinkable scenarios within this mind bending universe.
